short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write better LinkedIn posts with AI. Hintsay is an AI writing assistant supporting you to share great content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sync analytics from your LinkedIn profile with Hintsay to: 1. Get insights in your post performance. 2. Get AI content recommendations based on your profile and LinkedIn activity. To get started, make sure you have an Hintsay account. Then: 1. Enter your LinkedIn profile url in the settings page. 2. Install the Chrome Extension. 3. Enter the verification key. This extension provides the necessary information to Hintsay in order to show analytics and provide better content recommendations. Use your unique Hintsay verification key to verify your account and connect your LinkedIn account to Hintsay.
